name: CLUT: Cycle Last Used Tabs
description: Cycle through last used Chrome tabs using keyboard shortcut.

alt_switch_fast.description: Quick switch - Use to switch quickly among last 2 to 4 tabs.

alt_switch_slow_backward.description: Normal switch - Use to search through last used tabs at a slower pace

alt_switch_slow_forward.description: Normal switch - Use to search through last used tabs at a slower pace
